short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to enable/disable certain Twitter features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to enable/disable certain Twitter features.

You can enable/disable the following elements:
- The right sidebar
- The X Logo / header
- The message drawer/dock
- The Grok button
- The Premium button
- The "see hidden replies" button
- Verified Orgs button
- Communities button
- Timeline & reply ads
